message.body: Doing quite well! A day of video games and zombie films. Yourself?
That sounds like fun. I'm also playing video games. Nothing like roller coaster tycoon :)
Ah I love that game! What part are you at?
Just finished getting back to Sanctuary after it was ported.
Nice, you still have a ways to go then
Aye. Loving my mechromancer. My iPhone had fun with that word. Any chance you play WoW?
Lol I haven't tried out the mechromancer yet. I don't play WoW, but i play skyrim, which is kinda similar
Skyrim is awesome! :) I love the Elder Scrolls series. And mechromancer is a load of fun; the pet alone is a truck.
Maybe I'll be a mechromancer for play through 2 then :)
Granted she also reminds me of Tiny Tina a bit. Not sure how to feel about that.
Hmm I don't really see the resemblance except that they're both chicks
Oh no. Their voices and mannerisms. The way she talks reminds me a lot if her during fights.
Ah, I haven't heard the mechromancer talk so that's probably why I didn't notice
